#CMU Guidebook
Welcome to CMU!
This is an MRP+ server set in the Aliens Universe inspired by CM-SS13 and CM-SS13 PvE!
The guidebook, roadmap and rules for the game can be found on the lobby screen, and at any point in the escape menu.
Be sure to read the rules if you haven't already. - [textlink="The rules" link="RMCOverview"]
